    function quickSort(arr,left,right){
      let midIndex = arr.length/2
      let mid = arr.splice(midIndex,1)[0]
      left = []
      right = []
      arr.forEach(item => {
        if (item > mid) {
          right.push(item)
        } else {
          left.push(item)
        }
      });
      return quickSort(left).concat(mid,quickSort(right))
  }
